prerequisite: YSC2209 Proof (or permission of instructor) YSC3205 Linear Algebra (acceptable as a co-requisite too.)
moduleDescription: This course focuses on the extension of calculus to smooth functions of many variables. A geometric approach leads to a treatment of regions in n-dimensional space, smooth functions and their derivatives, differential forms, cycles, and integration. This course may be suitable for students seeking advanced study in mathematics for physics or economics.
